FuncDef:
The opaque-capability enable command enables the opaque LSA capability.
The undo opaque-capability command disables the opaque LSA capability. The opaque-capability enable command enables the opaque LSA capability. The undo opaque-capability command disables the opaque LSA capability. By default, the opaque LSA capability is disabled.
ExtraInfo: Opaque LSAs provide a generic mechanism for OSPF extension:
